questions.input: #python write the function for Concatenation of strings ?

#translate def concatenate_strings(str1,str2):
    result = [ele for ele in str1 + ele for ele in str2]
    return result

#java def concatenate_strings ( str1, str2 ) : 
    result = [ ele for ele in str1 + ele for ele in str2 ] 

result = [ ele for ele in str1 + ele for ele in str2 ]
questions.response: import java. util. Arrays ; class GFG { static void concatenateStrings ( String str1, String str2 ) : int n = str1. length ( ) ; int [ ] result1 = str2. toCharArray ( ) ; int [ ] result2 = str1. toCharArray ( ) ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( int j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( ele == str1. charAt ( i ) ) { result1 [ j ] = ele ; } else if ( ele == str2. charAt ( j ) ) { result2 [ j ] = ele ; } else if ( ele == str1. charAt ( i ) ) { result2 [ j ] = ele ; } else { result1 [ j ] = str1. toCharArray ( ) ; } } for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { System. out. print ( result2 [ i ] + " ▁ " ) ; } } public static void main ( String [ ] args ) { String str1 = " geeksforgeeks " ; String str2 = " geeks " ; concatenateStrings ( str1, str2 ) ; } }
